item.title: Don't mess with the Python
item.description: Recently in class, we have been using Python to explore essential packages and functions that assist in the ease of date manipulation. My personal favorite has been Reguar Expression operations. RegEx helps to learn how to match, search, and transform a string. Let's look at a few examples! Wait wait wait. We've already encountered our first problem. How can I show you Python coding if I'm using R?
